Texts.Chs: 把^orange;捣碎的水果^reset;带给我。(位于^orange;科学前哨站^reset;)
Texts.Eng: Bring the ^orange;mashed fruits^reset; to me at the ^orange;Science Outpost^reset;

Texts.Chs: 让我们来制作下一种饮料所需的材料吧！你需要把^green;苹果、梨、葡萄和桃子^reset;捣碎。
Texts.Eng: Let's get what we need for our next beverage. Mash some ^green;apples, pears, grapes and peaches^reset;.

Texts.Chs: 现在让我们再加把劲！你需要做得更出色！
Texts.Eng: Now let's move on to something a little harder. Something with some oomph!
